About Me

Hi, I am a third-year Ph.D. student at The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen. I am supervised jointly by Prof. Xiang Wan and Prof. Guanbin Li. I received my B.Eng. degree from Sun Yat-sen University in 2019, and then became a Ph.D. student at CUHK(SZ). My research lies at the intersection of vision and language, mainly focusing on representation learning. I am always open to collaboration. Feel free to drop me an e-mail. :-)
